DRAWLINE(0,50,480,50);
DRAWRECT(50,100,150,100);
DRAWSQUARE(50,250,50);
DRAWCIRCLE(250,275,50);
DRAWTRIANGLE(350,150,50);

LET BH = 20;
LET BW = 50;
LET SPACE = 5;

LET ROWS = INT(360 / (BH + SPACE));
LET COLS = INT(480 / (BW + SPACE));

FOR R = 0 TO ROWS
	FOR C = 0 TO COLS
		IF MOD(R,2) THEN
			IF C == 0 THEN
				DRAWRECT(C*(BW+SPACE),R*(BH+SPACE),BW/2,BH);
			ELSE
				DRAWRECT(C*(BW+SPACE)-BW/2,R*(BH+SPACE),BW,BH);
			ENDIF
		ELSE
			DRAWRECT(C*(BW+SPACE),R*(BH+SPACE),BW,BH);
		ENDIF
	FEND
FEND
